type.description:
### ⚠️ Requires [Mob Origins](https://moborigins.ultrusmods.me/en/latest/) to be installed! ⚠️

## Custom Sleep Block

---

This power type allows you to sleep on blocks other than beds.

---

### Example
```json
{
  "type": "moborigins:custom_sleep_block",
  "block_condition": {
    "type": "origins:in_tag",
    "tag": "minecraft:logs"
  }
}
```
This power will make it so that you can sleep on any log block.
type.markdownDescription:
### ⚠️ Requires [Mob Origins](https://moborigins.ultrusmods.me/en/latest/) to be installed! ⚠️

## Custom Sleep Block

---

This power type allows you to sleep on blocks other than beds.

---

### Example
```json
{
  "type": "moborigins:custom_sleep_block",
  "block_condition": {
    "type": "origins:in_tag",
    "tag": "minecraft:logs"
  }
}
```
This power will make it so that you can sleep on any log block.

block_condition.description: This determines what type of block you can sleep on, if null, any block will work.
block_condition.markdownDescription: This determines what type of block you can sleep on, if null, any block will work.
